title: Biden's Gender Strategy Smoke Screen | Guest: Lewie Pugh | 10/25/21
description:
The CDC director suggested mandatory counseling for citizens who refuse to get the vaccine. Once you give the government power, it will never be given back. Lewie Pugh, executive vice president of OOIDA, joins to give the truth about the claim that a truck driver shortage is to blame for the supply chain issues. Aaron Gonzalez and Michael Frazier, 3M employees, join to share their reasoning for protesting the vaccine mandate. Glenn warns of the dangers of the government having control of your bank account. The Biden administration announced a national gender strategy, which has only one goal: to destroy the family. Glenn compares America’s problems to alcoholism and gives the steps for how they can be fixed.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
